News.headline: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Barrow
News.page_title: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Barrow
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Barrow
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers Vanarama National League fixture against Barrow on Saturday.
News.description:
The Daggers return back to the Chigwell Construction Stadium following back to back away wins against York and Maidstone United respectively.

Playoff rivals Barrow currently sit 4th in the Vanarama National League and are on a 19 game unbeaten run in all competitions.

Previous 5 Results

Daggers
Maidstone 0-1 Daggers
York 0-2 Daggers
Halifax 2-1 Daggers (Emirates FA Cup)
Daggers 0-5 Gateshead
Daggers 0-0 Halifax (Emirates FA Cup)

Barrow
Barrow 3-0 Guiseley
Barrow 2-1 Solihull
Barrow 2-1 Taunton (Emirates FA Cup)
Sutton 0-0 Barrow
Taunton 2-2 Barrow

Team News
The Daggers are without a number of players for Saturday. Okenabirhie, Robson, Williams, Howell, Pennell, Ling, Robinson and Doe could all miss out due to injury. Andre Boucaud will be suspended due to receiving his fifth yellow card this season against Maidstone.

Previous Meetings
This will be the first time that the two teams have met in a competitive fixture.

Fixtures
There are a full list of Vanarama National League fixtures on Saturday with a 3:00pm kick off (unless stated)

Barrow V York
Dagenham and Redbridge V Barrow
Eastleigh V Chester
Guiseley V Boreham Wood
Lincoln City v Maidstone
Macclesfield V Dover
Solihull v North Ferriby
Southport V Braintree
Sutton V Aldershot
Tranmere V Torquay
Woking V Gateshead
Wrexham V Forest Green

Tickets
Ticket information for the game can be found here.

Social Media & Online
Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the website.
